name: Plains All American Pipeline, L.P.
description: Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. (PAA) is a publicly traded master limited partnership (MLP) that provides transportation, storage, and marketing of crude oil, natural gas liquids, and refined products. Founded in 1998 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, PAA operates an extensive network of pipelines and infrastructure across North America, facilitating the efficient movement of energy resources. The company is dedicated to delivering reliable services to its customers while maintaining a strong commitment to safety and environmental stewardship. Plains All American plays a critical role in the energy supply chain, connecting producers to refineries and markets, and ensuring the smooth operation of energy logistics. With a diverse asset base that includes over 18,000 miles of pipeline and numerous storage facilities, PAA is well-positioned to meet the evolving needs of the energy sector. The company also engages in the marketing of crude oil and other petroleum products, leveraging its extensive logistical capabilities. Plains All American is committed to operational excellence and strives for continuous improvement in safety, reliability, and service delivery. As the energy landscape evolves, PAA remains focused on strategic growth and innovation, adapting to changes in the market while supporting the energy transition.

seo.meta_description: Explore Plains All American Pipeline, L.P., a leader in energy transportation and storage. Learn about PAA's services, infrastructure, and commitment to safety.

faq.question: What services does Plains All American provide?
faq.answer: Plains All American provides transportation, storage, and marketing services for crude oil, natural gas liquids, and refined products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Plains All American?
faq.answer: The CEO of Plains All American is Will Rogers.

faq.question: Where is Plains All American headquartered?
faq.answer: Plains All American is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: When was Plains All American founded?
faq.answer: Plains All American was founded in 1998.
